EmailTemplate.name: Marketing Ticket Specialist Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: You are assigned Marketing Ticket {!Marketing_Ticket__c.Marketing_Ticket_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: You are assigned to {!Marketing_Ticket__c.Marketing_Ticket_ID__c} as a Specialist. Due date of this ticket is {!Marketing_Ticket__c.Due_Date__c} For details, please go to: {!Marketing_Ticket__c.Marketing_Ticket_ID__c}
